MercadoPago.name: Mercado Pago
MercadoPago.description: Pay with your Mercado Pago account.

payPal.name: PayPal
payPal.subtitle: Why pay with PayPal?
payPal.protectionDescription: your product will be delivered or you can get your money back*.
payPal.easyDescription: use only your e-mail and password.
payPal.safeDescription: your payment data won't be shared.
payPal.postScript: *Depends on requirements of Consumer Protection Program.

safetypay.name: Online Debit
safetypay.descriptionText: Pay with online debit via Interner Banking:
safetypay.descriptionBanks: Banco do Brasil, HSBC, Banrisul, Bradesco and Itaú.
safetypay.warrantedDescription: Stay calm. We offer the warranty of a certified environment.
safetypay.fastDescription: Just authorize the payment on your bank and go on with the order.
safetypay.safeDescription: No registration need and no payment data stored.
safetypay.helpTitle: Need help? Send us an e-mail: support@safetypay.com

giftCard.name: Gift card
giftCard.totalAlreadyPaid: All of the value is already covered
giftCard.showDiscounts: You have discount coupons to use. Should we show them?

debit.name: Online Debit
debit.description: This option is only valid for clients who have access to the Internet Banking option selected. After checkout, the bank will send us the confirmation within two days. Then, your order will be ready to be shipped as per the estimated time.

debitCard.name: Debit Card
debitCard.help: The card security code is located on the back of the card and is typically a separate group of 3 digits to the right of the signature strip.

creditCard.name: Credit card
creditCard.noCPF: I don't have a brazilian ID (CPF)
creditCard.helpHiperCard: If you Hipercard have a sequence of 6 digits above the 13 digits main sequence, you will need to type all numbers, starting with the 6 little ones, totalizing 19 digits.
creditCard.help: 3 digits number located on the back of the card.
creditCard.helpAmex: 4 digits number located on the front of the card.

scanner.swipeCardInstruction: Please, swipe the card in the magnetic reader

bankInvoice.name: Invoice
bankInvoice.description: The invoice will be available for printing after the checkout. You can pay in any bank, or take down its number and pay by the phone or Internet.

promissory.name: Credit Card
promissory.description: Our staff will call you to finish your checkout process.

modal.maskedInfoHello: Why do my data appear masked?
modal.maskedInfoMessage1: As you are not logged in, we protect your data by masking it with asterisks.
modal.maskedInfoMessage2: If you recognize that these are your personal details and your address, you can move on!
modal.maskedInfoMessage3: If you want to see or change them, just click on Personal Data or Delivery's edit icon.
modal.unavailableHello: The following item is unavailable for shipping at the moment:
modal.unavailableHelloPlural: The following items are unavailable for shipping at the moment:
modal.guestLoginMessage: To continue without authentication, you'll need to fill the form again.
modal.paymentUnauthorizedMessage1: Your purchase has not been finalized due to some problem in the authorization of payment.
modal.paymentUnauthorizedMessage2: You may have filled some data incorrectly or may have been some problem with the card in case of card purchase.

cart.emptyMessage: To continue shopping, browse the categories on the site or search for your products.
cart.unavailableForDelivery: This product cannot be delivered for this address.
cart.unavailableForOtherReason: This product is not currently available.

order.title: My Orders
order.noOrders: You didn't order anything in our store yet. Why don't you do your first?
order.orderGroupNotValid: The order number is not valid. Please check the URL.

paymentData.printBankInvoiceNotice: Print the bank invoice for the payment. Amount:

order.searchFor: Search for order, product name, status...
order.orderPlacedSuccessfully: Your order has been received successfully.
order.orderPlacedNotice: We are processing the payment, you'll receive a confirmation email shortly.
order.sentDetailsEmailPos: a confirmation email concerning all the order details.
order.orderLoadError: There was a problem loading your order information. Please, try again later.
order.listIsTooBig: You have more old orders. For more information about them, please contact us.

global.unkownError: An unexpected error ocurred, we are trying to solve it. Try again later.
global.validationErrorInThisForm: There is a validation error. Please correct any fields and try again.
global.pageIsLoadingPrompt: There are pending operations - please, wait a moment.
global.optinNewsLetter: I want to receive the newsletter.
global.saveData: I want to buy faster next time.
global.saveDataDetails: In the next purchase, you will not need to fill out the registration form. Your data is 100% safe.
global.errorServer: There was an error in our servers. Please try again later.
